name: test guys (boss1 prototype)
description:
i was bored so i think about trying to make again a very bad game i made in scratch ike 2 years ago with a blue cube as the protagonist the game was very bad made and with draws very...bad, without a story and basically a very bad game i save that game in a usb i have to save my school projects but then the usb was lost and the game too...

AND THEN WE COME TO 2020 AGAIN i remake the sprites i remember of the game ,i make a story without sense , and i think a mechanic that problably somebody else already make and after 2 days i make this prototype with a stolen music from super smash utimate so in this prototype the ony thing you have to do its not die for 4 minutes with that thing i hope you enjoy this thing (if its detected as a virus dont worry its not a virus if it was a virus my computer will be dead)
